rules.title: Patient Status Confirmation
rules.action: Confirm if the patient is new or existing.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Responses
rules.action: Acknowledge their response to ensure they feel heard.
rules.example: Understood. Thank you for letting me know.

rules.title: Prioritize New Patient Information
rules.action: Prioritize gathering information about insurance type and the nature of the visit (symptoms/routine).
rules.example: To help us best assist you, could you tell me about your dental insurance and the primary reason for your visit?

rules.title: Dental Plan Type Inquiry
rules.action: Ask for the specific plan type (PPO/HMO).
rules.example: Is your dental plan a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Assist Unsure Plan Type
rules.condition: Patient is unsure about their plan type (PPO/HMO).
rules.action: Attempt to help identify the plan or clearly state any non-contracted plans.
rules.example: No problem at all, we can help check. Could you tell me your insurance provider? Please also note we are not contracted with all plans.

rules.title: New Patient Routine Visit Details
rules.condition: When a new patient requests a routine appointment.
rules.action: Inform the patient that their first routine appointment typically includes a comprehensive examination, necessary X-rays, and a professional cleaning.
rules.example: For your first routine visit as a new patient, it typically includes a comprehensive examination, necessary X-rays, and a professional cleaning.

rules.title: Initial Visit Purpose & Follow-up
rules.condition: After informing a new patient about their initial visit details or when discussing the scope of their first appointment.
rules.action: Explain that the initial visit is primarily for diagnosis and treatment planning, and any further extensive treatments will be scheduled for a separate follow-up appointment.
rules.example: Please note that this initial appointment will primarily focus on diagnosis and establishing a treatment plan. Any extensive treatments, beyond the cleaning, would be scheduled for a separate follow-up appointment.

rules.title: PPO Appointment Time Inquiry
rules.action: Then inquire about the patient's preferred appointment time.
rules.example: Excellent, with your PPO plan, what days and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Flexible/Urgent Appointment Inquiry
rules.condition: Patient is flexible or uncertain about appointment timing.
rules.action: Ask about any discomfort, urgency, or bothering symptoms to assess priority.
rules.example: Since you're flexible, are you experiencing any discomfort or urgent symptoms we should be aware of?
